title: Another day, another news story
body: Another news story about the eBay auction will run tonight on ABC 33 at 5:00 PM and 10:00 PM. Let's hope it doesn't have an extreme close-up of my eyeballs like the last one did. I think the News-Leader is running a blurb about the auction in tomorrow's paper as well, so keep an eye out for that. Nicole and I are going to go clean the floors at the theater... fun, fun, fun!
author: Dan

comments.author: matt
comments.body: Dan Chilton... has vision!  News at 11.

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body:
Did you know that your eyeballs are the only organ that doesn't grow/change in shape from the time you're born until you die?

See Dan, you've had giant eyeballs your whole life...you just didn't know it.

Vision baby...vision.

comments.author: Laura
comments.body: Forgive me if this has been brought up before, but have you sent press releases about the auction to major news services like AP or Reuters?

comments.author: Surferbill
comments.body: Ananova has a quirkies section that might run the story too.

comments.author: Pat
comments.body:
I submitted the release to Ananova and Reuters. I guess that proves how much pull I have.

Afterwards, I was told by a PR friend that it is much better to submit story ideas and releases to an actual person. It would require a bit of research to figure out which reporter might be interested. But I am told the success rate will be much higher.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
I missed it AGAIN! I was on the phone and forgot. Dan's giant eyeballs prove as elusive as ever. I'm shaking my fist in the air and saying, "Damn you giant eyeballs! DAMN YOU!"

Then I sip my Juicy Juice.
